name: Laika (itch) (jamdogs)
description:
You play as Laika, the first dog ever sent into space. You've been secretly defending Earth from outer space monsters since 1957.

Use the arrow keys, WASD, or the left thumb stick on a controller to move your ship and avoid enemies.

Weapons automatically fire. You can upgrade them by picking up stars left behind by defeated enemies.

Good luck out there, and survive as long as you can!

---

This game was made as a learning experience and an entry for 7DRL Game Jam 2022, and heavily inspired by Vampire Survivors. Please check out their game and purchase it to support their devs!
